# lipu linja pi jan ale
## nimi toki tan lipu linja pi musi olin

---

### toki jan li jo e kon ante

| toki jan | kon lon |
|----------|---------|
| "mi wile e ni: mi en sina li jan pona taso" | "mi wile ala e ni: sina pilin e mi" |
| "mi wile toki e ijo" | "mi pilin ike tan sina" |
| "mi jo e lawa pi pilin ike" | "mi wile ala lukin e sina lon tenpo ni" |
| "mi wile ala e jan ante" | "mi wile ala e sina" |
| "mi pali mute lon tenpo ni" | "mi wile ala lon poka sina" |
| "mi wile pini e ni" | "mi olin ala e sina" |
| "a" | "mi pilin pona tan pali sina" |
| "mi sona ala" | "mi wile ala toki e ni" |
| "pona" | "ike tawa mi taso mi toki ala" |
| "mi wile moku" | "mi wile moku" |
| "mi wile lape" | "mi wile lape" |
| "mi olin e sina" | "ken la mi olin e sina" |
| "mi wile e sina" | "mi wile unpa" |
| "sina pona lukin" | "mi wile unpa e sina" |
| "mi pilin ike" | "mi wile e ni: sina toki pona tawa mi" |
| "luka mi li wile lape" | "mi wile e ni: sina pali e ijo" |
| "seme?" | "mi kute ala tan ni: mi pilin ante" |
| "pona a" | "toki ni li pini" |

---

### nasin pi olin kama

1. mi wile tawa insa uta sina, tawa luka sina ala
2. mi awen lukin e sina tan ni: mi wile sona e ni: sina jan anu sewi
3. mi wile e ni: sina kama weka tan pilin mi ala
4. mi pilin e ni: mi sona e sina tan tenpo pini
5. jan li ken ala pali e sina pona. jan mama sina li pona mute a
6. mi lukin e poka monsi sina. ken la mi ken lukin lon tenpo mute?
7. mi jan nasa ala. mi wile mute tawa sina taso
8. mi wile lon insa len sina
9. ni li musi ala. mi olin e sina lon tenpo ni
10. mi wile tawa ma ante poka sina
11. mi pilin e ni: sina weka e pilin mi
12. mi wile awen lon poka sina lon tenpo pimeja ni
13. sina wile ala wile lon poka mi lon tomo mi?
14. mi pilin ike. ken la sina pona e mi?
15. mi pilin pakala tan lukin sina
16. sina pona lukin. taso mi wile sona e insa sina
17. mi wile e ni: sina lon ala la mi lape ala

---

### musi lon tomo tawa sewi

1. o pali e kalama pi tomo tawa tawa
2. o toki tawa jan ante: "mi jo e len insa pona lon tenpo ni"
3. o pali e kalama musi kepeken uta sina
4. o toki tawa sinpin pi tomo tawa: "jan Lisa? sina lon ala lon?"
5. o awen lukin e jan ante. o musi kepeken oko
6. jan li kama lon tomo la o toki: "a! kama pona! mi awen e sina!"
7. o toki e ni tawa jan: "sina pilin ala pilin e ni: jan li lukin e sina?"
8. o weka e len noka sina. o toki: "luka mi li wile kon"
9. o pali e sitelen lon sinpin kepeken ko
10. o toki e nimi mute pi nasin sewi ante
11. o awen lon kasi suli
12. o toki tawa jan: "sina wile ala wile kute e kalama musi mi?"
13. o kalama musi: "jan Meli li jo e soweli lili"
14. o lukin sewi. o toki: "suno li lon ala lon sewi?"
15. jan li open e lupa la o toki: "ala! ni tawa ala!"
16. o awen lon supa. o toki e ni: "mi pilin nasa"
17. o tawa lon insa tomo kepeken nasin pi jan lili
18. o toki: "mi kute e kalama lon insa sina"
19. o pana e sitelen tawa jan: "sina wile ala wile nanpa wan mi?"
20. o pali e kalama musi kepeken luka tu

---

### nasin pi uta olin

**uta li lon luka** = mi olin e sina
**uta li lon linja oko** = mi wile e sina
**uta li lon kute** = mi musi taso
**uta li lon sinpin** = mi jan pona sina
**uta li lon noka** = mi pilin e ni: sina jan sewi
**uta li lon monsi** = mi wile sona: sina olin ala olin e mi?
**uta li lon lawa** = mi awen lon poka sina

---

### nasin sewi pi uta olin

1. o uta lon tenpo wile taso
2. o awen lon poka jan sina lon tenpo uta
3. o pana e uta lon tenpo pona

---

### lipu linja li pini

**o pana e lipu ni tawa jan 27 lon tenpo suno 5.**

sina pana la jan pona li kama tawa sina lon tenpo suno 7.

sina pana ala la ike li kama.

jan wan li pana ala. tenpo suno kama la ona li pilin ike mute.

jan ante li pana. tenpo lili la jan olin li kama!

---

*lipu ni li tan kulupu pi musi linja. toki Inli li kama tan ma Mewika lon tenpo pini. mi ante e ona tawa toki pona. mi weka e nimi meli en nimi mije tan ni: jan ale li sama.*

**o olin o musi o pona!**
